[center][font size=4]Muximux Change Log[/font][/center] [b]30.09.2016:[/b] Rebase to alpine linux. [b]22.02.2016:[/b] Initial Release.
Container.Name: muximux
Container.Description: A lightweight portal to view, manage your HTPC apps without having to run anything more than a PHP enabled webserver. With Muximux you don't need to keep multiple tabs open, or bookmark the URL to all of your apps.[br] [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Storing all muximux config files [br]
Container.Overview: A lightweight portal to view, manage your HTPC apps without having to run anything more than a PHP enabled webserver. With Muximux you don't need to keep multiple tabs open, or bookmark the URL to all of your apps.
